channel.title: Need help please really bad such a bug!

item.title: Need help please really bad such a bug!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

just do this…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dzone") && donator >= 1) { triggerTele("2095, 4428, 0"); } else if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dzone") && donator == 0) { sM("you need to be a donator to go here"); sM("to donate, go to death2uscape.webs.com"); }

its simpler than you think,
line 1: if the command is dzone, and donator is bigger or equal to 1…
line 2: go to 2095 (x) 4428 (y) 0 (height)
line 3: if command is dzone and donator = 0,
line 4: sM("you need to be a donator to go here
line 4: (same thing as line 4, just a different message)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help please really bad such a bug!

item.title: Need help please really bad such a bug!
item.dc:creator: @deathbyu deathbyu
item.description:
@deathbyu wrote:

i need help i made a cod that is
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dzone”) && donator >= 1)
{
String[] args = command.split(" ");
toX = 2095;
toY = 4428;
}
else
{
sM(“You need to be a dontaor to go here.”);
sM(“To donate go to [death2uscape.webs.com].”);
}

and every time i go to it i use any other command like ::modzone insted of ::dzone it gives me the
sM(“You need to be a dontaor to go here.”);
sM(“To donate go to [death2uscape.webs.com].”);
even thou its a diff command how do i make it so it only send the messeges to 1 command

Read full topic
